channel.title: Kowainik Blog
channel.description: We are writing about what we find fascinating or exciting. Our blog's aim is to share our knowledge about functional programming, distribute best-practices based on our extensive experience and tell about various topics from beginner-friendly introductions to advanced type-level tricks.
